Articles.Content:
Pretty soon, I'll be releasing a cursed mod pack. Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg, and Jeff Bezos will be a new skin for the KSP Texture Replacer mod. Any thoughts about it, if so let me know down below.

 

(Yes, I was inspired by the "Scott Manley Head pack" - Link for that is here:
Have a Look at Benji historic heads, while the Scott Manley Head is funny, its not one I think most people will actively use. Rather go for a more kerbalized look.

9 hours ago, PicoSpace said:

Have a Look at Benji historic heads, while the Scott Manley Head is funny, its not one I think most people will actively use. Rather go for a more kerbalized look.

Thanks for showing me this, benji is always good at mods, but I was making this pack to be funny and creepy. Thanks for the reply!
